entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of showers before morning. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
